entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 1:20 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: ESE 46 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 mm near Port Alice. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023
